concept.title: GCHORIZONTAL Command
concept.shortdesc: Creates a horizontal geometric constraint on 2D entities.

conbody.p: Create a horizontal constraint to ensure a linear entity or pair of points remains parallel to the x-axis.

section.title: Methods to create a horizontal constraint
section.p:
There are two methods to begin creating a horizontal constraint:
Select an entity
2 Points

dlentry.dd: Create a horizontal constraint by selecting a linear entity to make parallel to the x-axis.
Begin creating a horizontal constraint by specifying the first point to make parallel to the x-axis then:
Specify the second point to make horizontal to the x-axis. The first point maintains its position while the second point moves to become horizontal with the first point.
